title: Should I?
body:
Should I spend about 35 to get the champions bundle for my smurf acc?
So I have more champions to play, so its more fair when I play ranked on that Acc.

Guys help me out.

replies.body:
Do you want to spend 35 bucks to get the champions on your smurf?

I don't know, and most people probably don't care. If you need champs and are willing to spend that much, go for it. If not, don't

Yeah I don't want too trust me.
I go onto that account to have some fun, I dont use it to be toxic as I hate toxic payers and thus never wish to be one.

It's just Im nice in a way, I have limited number of champs on that ACC, and thought that having more of them will allow me to FIll more roles instead of only being able to do Mid(2 champs) ADC(2 champs) and support (2-3 champs) I have like 1 top and jungler.

So my options are limited, Its just I want to play ranked respectively. As should everyone else. No matter the Acc.
This way I can better prepare for team synergy or help out more.

Maybe when I play that ACC some more is when I throw more money at Riot.
They should start keeping score on who throws more money at them.
